sourcesContent:
navbar works!

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/auth/services/auth.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.scss'] }) export class NavbarComponent implements OnInit{ showNavbar$!: Observable; constructor(private authService: AuthService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.authService.getToken() ? this.showNavbar = true : this.showNavbar } }
